i1.name: Rage Gene
description: {{sbc|Innate - Mini Gnar:}} While in '''Mini Gnar''' form, '''Gnar''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{sti|range|attack range}}, {{as|attack speed growth}} and {{sti|{{as|attack speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Rage Gene:}} '''Mini Gnar''' generates {{passive progression/deprecated version|4;7;11|1 to 11}} ''{{ai|Rage Gene|Gnar|Rage}}'' over 2 seconds upon dealing or receiving [[damage]]. Against non-[[champion]]s, [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Boomerang Throw|Gnar}} instantly generate{{ft|{{pp|4*0.125;7*0.125;11*0.125|1 to 11|round=false}} ''Rage''.|{{fd|12.5%}} of the amount.}} Against champions, {{ai|Boomerang Throw|Gnar}} instantly generates{{ft|{{pp|4*0.25;7*0.25;11*0.25|1 to 11|round=false}} ''Rage'',|25% of the amount,}}and basic attacks instantly generate{{ft|{{pp|4*0.5;7*0.5;11*0.5|1 to 11|round=false}}.|50% of the amount.}}{{ai|Boomerang Throw|Gnar}} can only generate ''Rage'' once per cast, and grants ''Rage'' based on the first enemy hit. '''Gnar's''' ''Rage'' decays if he has not dealt or taken damage in the last 13 seconds.

At maximum ''{{ai|Rage Gene 2|Gnar|Rage}}'', casting an ability or after 4 seconds will ''{{ai|Rage Gene 3|Gnar|transform}}'' '''Mini Gnar''' into {{ci|Mega Gnar}} for 15 seconds, during which '''Gnar's''' ''Rage'' depletes. Afterwards '''Gnar''' returns to '''Mini Gnar''' and is too ''{{ai|Rage Gene 4|Gnar|tired}}'' to generate ''Rage'' for 15 seconds. '''Gnar''' retains his {{sti|health|{{as|'''current''' percentage health}}}} when he returns to '''Mini Gnar'''.

{{sbc|Innate - Mega Gnar:}} '''Mega Gnar''' has different abilities, although they share '''Mini Gnar's''' ability cooldowns. While in '''Mega Gnar''' form, '''Gnar''' loses all of '''Mini Gnar's''' buffs and instead has increased {{sti|ad|{{as|'''base''' AD}}}}, {{sti|health|{{as|'''base''' health}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|'''base''' armor}}}}, and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''base''' magic resistance}}}}. '''Gnar''' [[healing|restores]] {{sti|{{as|health}}}} equal to the increase.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Movespeed|{{pp|0 to 14 by 1;14 to 20|displayformula=0 + 1 per level up to 15, then + 2 per level}}|Total Movespeed|{{passive progression/deprecated version|335 to 349;351;353;355|displayformula=334 + 1 per level up to 15, then + 2 per level}}}}{{st|Bonus Range|{{passive progression/deprecated version|0 to 100}}}}
i1.notes:
* The ''Rage'' generated upon dealing or receiving damage occurs over 2 seconds with 4 ticks every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. It also does not stack but instead refreshes with subsequent applications (of dealing or receiving damage).
* The bonus rage generation on basic attacks counts as an {{tip|on-hit}} effect, and is triggered by {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} and {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.
* In-game, the value on the ''Rage'' bar always displays rounded down to the nearest integer.
* {{cis|Mega Gnar}} gained health is not affected by [[healing]] modifiers such as {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} and those from [[item]]s and [[rune]]s.
* When returning to {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}}, '''Gnar''' will only retain his current health percentage, not current health total.
** This is intentional to prevent '''Gnar''' from simply triggering {{ai|Rage Gene 3|Gnar|Rage Gene}} in order to heal himself over time.
* '''Gnar's''' abilities share {{sti|cooldowns}} across forms.
* The final stats, after {{ai|Rage Gene 3|Gnar|Rage Gene}} being applied, can be seen on '''Mini Gnar's''' and '''Mega Gnar's''' respective data template, in the [[Gnar|front page]].
** '''Mini Gnar''' gains {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|key=%|5.5+({{ccd|Gnar|as_lvl}}-{{ccd|Mega Gnar|as_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula=5.5 base+{{#expr:{{ccd|Gnar|as_lvl}}-{{ccd|Mega Gnar|as_lvl}}}} growth}}|attack speed}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}.
** '''Mega Gnar''' gains {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_base}}}} base+{{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_lvl}}}} growth}}|health}} {{as|'''base''' health}}, {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_base}}}} base+{{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_lvl}}}} growth}}|armor}} {{as|'''base''' armor}}, {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_base}}}} base+{{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_lvl}}}} growth}}|magic resistance}} {{as|'''base''' magic resistance}}, and {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_base}}}} base+{{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_lvl}}}} growth}}|attack damage}} {{as|'''base''' attack damage}}

r1.name: GNAR!
description: {{sbc|{{ci|Mega Gnar}} - Active:}} '''Gnar''' {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} nearby enemies up to 590 units in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 45% after a {{fd|0.4}}-second delay.

Enemies that collide with terrain take [[File:Critical strike icon.png|20px|link=]] {{tt|50% '''bonus''' damage|cosmetic critical strike}} instantly and are {{tip|stun|stunned}} instead of {{tip|slow|slowed}}.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|200*1.5 to 400*1.5}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
r1.notes: * ''GNAR!'s'' active interacts with player-created terrain ({{ai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{ai|Emperor's Divide|Azir}}, {{ai|Cataclysm|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}).

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|200*1.5 to 400*1.5}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 100% AP)
  • Increased Damage: (+ 75% bonus AD) (+ 150% AP)
